languages.text: "Интересно. Я никогда не слышал о вас от Денза, а ведь знакомство такого ранга — не пустяк..." {n}Капеллан не рискует открыто вас обвинять во лжи, но, кажется, он совсем не убежден ответом.{/n} "Впрочем, знакомство с вами не единственный такой секрет — мне также неизвестно, кто таков или такова Фиделио, которого Денз назначил наследником".

"Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."
languages.original_text: "Интересно. Я никогда не слышал о вас от Денза, а ведь знакомство такого ранга — не пустяк..." {n}Капеллан не рискует открыто вас обвинять во лжи, но, кажется, он совсем не убежден ответом.{/n} "Впрочем, знакомство с вами не единственный такой секрет — мне также неизвестно, кто таков или такова Фиделио, которого Денз назначил наследником".

"Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

languages.text: “真有趣，我从来没听丹兹提起过你。如果他认识像你这样的朋友，这可不是什么不值一提的小事……”{n}看起来，牧师并不打算冒着风险公开指责你说谎，但他似乎也并不相信你的说法。{/n}“不过，这也并不是他唯一的秘密。丹兹指定菲迪奥为他的继承人，但我依然不知道这个菲迪奥究竟是什么人。”
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: “真有趣，我从来没听丹兹提起过你。如果他认识像你这样的朋友，这可不是什么不值一提的小事……”{n}看起来，牧师并不打算冒着风险公开指责你说谎，但他似乎也并不相信你的说法。{/n}“不过，这也并不是他唯一的秘密。丹兹指定菲迪奥为他的继承人，但我依然不知道这个菲迪奥究竟是什么人。”

languages.text: «Interesante. Denz nunca me había hablado de usted, y los conocidos de su talla no son un asunto menor...». {n}Capellán no parece querer arriesgarse a acusarte de mentir, pero tampoco se cree tu respuesta.{/n} «Dicho eso, este no sería el primer secreto que descubro. Aún no sé quién es Fidelio, la persona a la que Denz lega su fortuna».
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: «Interesante. Denz nunca me había hablado de usted, y los conocidos de su talla no son un asunto menor...». {n}Capellán no parece querer arriesgarse a acusarte de mentir, pero tampoco se cree tu respuesta.{/n} «Dicho eso, este no sería el primer secreto que descubro. Aún no sé quién es Fidelio, la persona a la que Denz lega su fortuna».

languages.text: 「なるほど。私はデンツからあなたのことを聞いたことはありません。それに、あなたのような地位の方と知り合いであれば、すぐにわかると思うのですが…」{n}教戒官はこちらが嘘をついていると公然と非難するリスクを冒す覚悟はなさそうだが、明らかに疑っている。{/n}「とはいえ、秘密は他にもあるようです…デンツが相続人に指定したフィデリオという人物の正体も知りませんのでね」
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほど。私はデンツからあなたのことを聞いたことはありません。それに、あなたのような地位の方と知り合いであれば、すぐにわかると思うのですが…」{n}教戒官はこちらが嘘をついていると公然と非難するリスクを冒す覚悟はなさそうだが、明らかに疑っている。{/n}「とはいえ、秘密は他にもあるようです…デンツが相続人に指定したフィデリオという人物の正体も知りませんのでね」

languages.text: "Interessant. Denz hat nie von Euch erzählt, und eine Bekanntschaft von derartigem Stand ist keine Kleinigkeit ..." {n}Ordenspriester scheint dich nicht offen der Lüge bezichtigen zu wollen, aber er scheint deine Antwort auch nicht zu glauben.{/n} "Andererseits ist das Treffen mit Euch nicht das einzige Geheimnis, das ich entdeckt habe – ich weiß nach wie vor nicht, wer Fidelio ist, die Person, der Denz alles vererbt hat."
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: "Interessant. Denz hat nie von Euch erzählt, und eine Bekanntschaft von derartigem Stand ist keine Kleinigkeit ..." {n}Ordenspriester scheint dich nicht offen der Lüge bezichtigen zu wollen, aber er scheint deine Antwort auch nicht zu glauben.{/n} "Andererseits ist das Treffen mit Euch nicht das einzige Geheimnis, das ich entdeckt habe – ich weiß nach wie vor nicht, wer Fidelio ist, die Person, der Denz alles vererbt hat."

languages.text: « Intéressant. Vous n'êtes pas n'importe qui, mais Denz ne m'a jamais parlé de vous... » {n}Chapelain ne semble pas prêt à vous accuser ouvertement de mentir, mais il vous fait bien sentir qu'il ne vous croit pas.{/n} « Enfin, je sais qu'il avait des secrets. J'en ai découvert un autre, d'ailleurs, bien que j'ignore encore qui est ce Fidélio que Denz a désigné comme héritier. »
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant. Vous n'êtes pas n'importe qui, mais Denz ne m'a jamais parlé de vous... » {n}Chapelain ne semble pas prêt à vous accuser ouvertement de mentir, mais il vous fait bien sentir qu'il ne vous croit pas.{/n} « Enfin, je sais qu'il avait des secrets. J'en ai découvert un autre, d'ailleurs, bien que j'ignore encore qui est ce Fidélio que Denz a désigné comme héritier. »

languages.text: "İlginç. Denz'in sizden bahsettiğini hiç duymadım. Böylesine saygın bir tanıdık az buz şey değil ne de olsa." {n}Papaz, seni açıkça yalancılıkla suçlama riskini göze alamıyor ama cevabına da kanmadığı belli.{/n} "Gerçi sizinle tanışmak, fark ettiğim tek sır değil. Denz'in kendine vâris olarak belirlediği şu Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu hâlâ bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I've never heard about you from Denz, and an acquaintance of such standing is no small thing..." {n}Chaplain doesn't look ready to risk openly accusing you of lying, but he doesn't seem to be buying your answer either.{/n} "Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered — I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: "İlginç. Denz'in sizden bahsettiğini hiç duymadım. Sizin gibi saygın birini tanımak az buz bir şey değil aslında." {n}Papaz seni açıkça yalancılıkla suçlama riskini göze alamıyor ama cevabına da kanmadığı belli.{/n} "Gerçi sizinle tanışmak, fark ettiğim tek sır değil. Denz'in kendine vâris olarak belirlediği şu Fidelio denen adamın kim olduğunu hâlâ bilmiyorum."
